content: X-EMTC P-clip with X-U nail Metal conduit strap with pre-mounted, ultimate-performance nail for fastening cables/pipes to tough concrete using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Very fast – for cost-efficient conduit, cable or pipe fastenings Bracing rib for high rigidity and a tight, secure hold on flexible conduits Includes a high-performance fastener for attaching conduits to tough concrete and steel Applications Fastening flexible and rigid electrical conduits, cables, water and heating pipes, injection hoses ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduit Fastening Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Masonry (solid clay brick), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Approvals | N/A | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 226910 -
